Knight.hint: A brave melee fighter with decent hp

Goblins.hint: Three to four fast creatures armed with daggers.

Archers.hint: Two ranged attackers that shoot from a distance.

Fireball.hint: A powerful spell that deals area damage.

Arrows.hint: A cheap spell that clears swarms of troops.

Zap.hint: A quick spell that stuns and damages.

Valkyrie.hint: A melee fighter with a spinning attack that hits all nearby enemies.

Mini PEKKA.hint: A smaller but fast version of P.E.K.K.A that deals heavy single-target damage.

Mega Minion.hint: A flying unit that deals moderate damage.

Musketeer.hint: A long-range shooter that targets both air and ground units.

PEKKA.hint: A heavily armored melee unit with high damage.

Giant.hint: A tanky unit that targets buildings.

Balloon.hint: A flying unit that targets buildings and drops bombs.

Wizard.hint: A ranged unit that deals area splash damage.

Princess.hint: A long-range archer that can attack from afar.

Ice Wizard.hint: Slows down enemies while dealing moderate area damage.

Miner.hint: A unit that can be deployed anywhere in the arena.

Electro Wizard.hint: Deals damage and stuns two targets on spawn and attack.

Baby Dragon.hint: A flying unit that deals area damage.

Bomber.hint: Throws bombs that deal area damage.

Cannon.hint: A defensive building that targets ground units.

Tesla.hint: A defensive building that targets both air and ground units.

Tornado.hint: A spell that pulls units into its center.

Freeze.hint: A spell that freezes enemy units and buildings.

Rocket.hint: A high-damage spell that targets a small area.

Giant Snowball.hint: A spell that deals damage and knocks back units.

Hunter.hint: A close-range unit that deals high burst damage.

Executioner.hint: Throws an axe that bounces between enemies.

Electro Dragon.hint: A flying unit that chains lightning between enemies.

Firecracker.hint: A ranged unit that deals high burst damage.

Royal Ghost.hint: A stealthy unit that becomes invisible when not attacking.

Lumberjack.hint: A fast-moving unit that drops a Rage spell upon death.

Inferno Dragon.hint: A flying unit that deals increasing damage over time.

Royal Recruits.hint: Seven units that deploy in a line.

Golden Knight.hint: A Champion with a dash ability.

Archer Queen.hint: A Champion with a cloak ability.

Skeleton King.hint: A Champion that summons skeletons upon death.
